entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
